name: Pumpkin Forest (Default)
description:
SURVIVE UNTIL DAWN!

This entry is a tribute/remake for the old Ghoul's Forest doom wad!

Controls - W A S D & Left mouse

You have to charge the bow to shoot, but don't hold it for too long!

Hope you enjoy!

Update

I might have made this game quite tough, here's some good tips:

1. Keep moving! The monsters are fast but moving should help!
2. Ready the bow when they are closing in!
3. If you hear footsteps, look a bit up!
4. If you hear cripply crawling sounds, look down!
5. If you hear screaming, hold still and get ready to shoot whatever is coming!
Bonus: Don't waste your arrows in the pumpkins, they are just for show!

I might release a build that makes it a bit easier later
